title: LSEG Debuts Digital Settlement Platform in Blockchain Push
description: The London Stock Exchange Group Plc has launched a blockchain-friendly digital settlement service, as the bourse operator deepens its use of the technology underpinning cryptocurrencies.

title: State Steps in to Fund Domo’s Insolvent German Chemical Site
description: Germany’s state of Saxony-Anhalt will temporarily finance Domo Chemicals GmbH’s insolvent plastics production site in Leuna to prevent a potentiallly damaging shutdown.

title: Tesla and xAI Ties Raise Questions About ‘Muskonomy’
description: The AI startup and public carmaker are headed for a tighter relationship.
